text: The Pfyffe is a mountain of the Bernese Alpine foothills located between the municipalities of Guggisberg and Rüschegg in the canton of Bern. It is part of the wooded range north of the Gurnigel Pass, which culminates at the Selibüel. On the southern slopes of the mountain lies the small resort of Ottenleuebad (1,430 m). ==References== ==External links== *Pfyffe on Hikr Category:Mountains of the Alps Category:Mountains of the canton of Bern Category:Mountains of Switzerland
title: Pfyffe
